name: Train with Blocks
description: This is a wonderful toy to fuel the imagination!

name: Three Coloured Cats
description: A Family of Wodden Cats, how cute!

name: Heritage Wooden Train
description: This traditional toy is a must have for children of all ages. Classic wooden train is made from different sorts of wood: beech and walnut tree. It’s beautifully made and crafted. Each piece is very strong and sturdy. The set has one engine and three big cars. It will expand you kid’s imagination as they picture the train setting and initiate an active role-playing game.

name: Assorted animals with pouch
description: Each one is hand crafted from cherry wood, with the rich natural grain shining. That is why their look and feel of the wood let children make their own fantasy forest world. We recommend to purchase completely forest set. Each animal is also available separately. Animals are packed into the cotton sack.

name: Wodden 'Herbie' Car
description: The inspiration to make this classical wooden car was VW Bug. Automobile has realistic shapes, it is small copy of famous LoveBug from the classic movie. Car Herbie is made of three different sorts of wood, beech, walnut and maple. The satin smooth surfaces and old-fashioned shapes entertain the younger as well as the older fans of cars.

name: Screw Tower Blocks
description: Screw tower blocks it’s 6 pieces toy, which helps kids develop fine motor skills and think creatively. Toy motivates children to use their hands in order to discover forms. Tower is made from beech and has rectangle base and five different shapes twist pieces
